StoryText: I'm taking a Geography quiz in school and I am trying to figure out the answer to this last question.
Question: 'What is the capital of South Dakota?'

OptionResult.Result: That's the right answer! And my teacher %FullName:NPC:1% is happy with me because %Pron:1:1% is from South Dakota and talks about it all the time.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% was happy I got that one right since %Pron:1:1% always talks about South Dakota. I'm glad I got it right because it helped my grade!

OptionResult.Result: This is the wrong answer and my teacher %FullName:NPC:1% is upset I didn't remember because %Pron:1:1% talks about being from South Dakota all the time.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, %FullName:NPC:1% felt like I should've gotten that one right, since %Pron:1:1% always talks about being from South Dakota. Oh well.

OptionResult.Result: This is the wrong answer and my teacher %FullName:NPC:1% is upset I didn't remember because %Pron:1:1% talks about being from South Dakota all the time.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, %FullName:NPC:1% felt like I should've gotten that one right, since %Pron:1:1% always talks about being from South Dakota. Oh well.

OptionResult.Result: My teacher %FullName:NPC:1% is really upset with me because this isn't even a city in South Dakota.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% tells me I am lucky that %Pron:1:1% can't mark me down a whole letter grade for choosing that answer because I wasn't only wrong... I was very wrong. Whoops!
